dict.string: The `tj.listen(_:)` method uses a callback function to pass back the text heard by TJBot.

An easy way to use `tj.listen(_:)` is as follows:
`tj.listen { (response) in ... }`
You can make the interaction with TJBot more natural by checking if the `response` includes a phrase such as "turn the light" or "change the light".
Use `response.components(separatedBy:" ")` to split the response string into a list of words to check for the presence of a color.
